alert.note: Alert for Brooks (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 1:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson, Taylor, Madison and southeastern Brooks Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 142 PM EDT, residual wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph were trailing and earlier line of thunderstormos. These gusts will be tracking east across Madison and Taylor Counties through 215 PM EDT. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Perry, Greenville, Lee, Pinland, Tennille, Jug Island, Ebb, Hamburg, Pinetta, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Lovett, Nankin, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Empress, Foley and Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
